325040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Sundered Skies #1 The Ice Tower
325040.description:
Adventure for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop
A Mysterious Tower of Ice Waiting to be Explored!
Across the hostile waters of The Draining Sea lies a frozen island which is the
location of the mysterious Tower of Ice. Legends tell of fabulous relics and riches
hidden within this cold dark tower. The businessman and adventurer Skiller, requires
the help of your heroes to explore the tower.
He has an old map which and believes that it depicts the Ice Tower sitting on an
island. The surrounding water of the island is ice, but the island is composed of
harder, glacial ice which the tower has been constructed from. Skiller is looking
for a few hardy souls to accompany him to the Ice Tower. Are you with him?
Do your heroes take a chance of glory and riches or will danger await them in The
Ice Tower!
Triple Ace Games is proud to present The Ice Tower. This module is
the first official adventure for the highly acclaimed Savage Worlds setting
Sundered Skies.
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Alan Neilson
Requirements: A Full or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds, the Savage Worlds
ruleset.
Recommended:Sundered Skies setting and the Sundered Skies Figure Flats Token
Pack.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Alan Neilson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
